description: This fast and fabulous pasta recipe is perfect for a cosy night in. It's made with a rich meatball ragu that's full of flavour and is ready in just 20 minutes.
keywords: Pasta with meatballs,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Pasta With Meatball Ragu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g La Molisana pastificio extra di lusso paccarielli rigati

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain and return to pan.
Meanwhile, heat 2 tbs extra virgin olive oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook meatballs, turning, for 8 minutes or until well browned.

Combine recipe base and 1 1/4 cups water in a medium jug, then add to meatballs. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until sauce has thickened, adding the peas in the last 2 minutes of cooking.
Add pasta to meatball mixture and toss gently to combine. Divide among bowls. Season with pepper and serve.
